page.title: 09Games in Clayton-le Woods: 2
page.content: {Hide and Seek:}A game for four or more players. The players must choose who will be 'on' and decide on a place to use as a base. The player who is 'on' must close his eyes and count to 100 at the base while everyone else goes to hide (not more than two may hide in any one place). At the end of the count the person who is 'on' must try to find all the other players. If a player (e.g. Peter) is found the person who is 'on' must run to the base and say, "One two three Peter" so that Peter is caught. If a player (e.g. Philip) thinks he can run to the base before the person who is on he can and must say, "One two three save Philip" when he gets there and then he will not be caught. The game goes on until the last player is found. The first player to be found becomes 'on' and the game starts again.
